Text:

thanks man. We already owe u 42 beers , wonder where im gonna get the money for them :)
Oh my god you are amazing! I made this accout a few weeks ago just to thank you, and that's still the only thing I have used it for.

thanx everyone for the comments and keeping the torrent alive this weekend is your task cause i'm going to festival number 2 of this year.
a smaller one than last week but the weather was great. I can already say defqon1 2013 here i come lol

can't thank you enough ichiro. these things are expensive as shit. i try to purchase paper tradebacks of the ones im a huge fan of, but shit gets expensive but at least i can keep up with all through you. also what are everyones faves? im a pretty big fan of animal man, resurrection man, detective, justice league, flash, GL, and batman incorperated.

I wish I could support all these DC issues but I have to pick and choose where my money goes. Your torrents really help me keep up to date on all of them.  Thanks so much! (created this account just to thank you.)
I throw my gratitude and appreciation to you each week!!
thanks again for the update ichiro !!!

Two atoms are walking down the street together. The first atom turns and says, "Hey, you just stole an electron from me!"

"Are you sure?" asks the second atom.

To which the first atom replies, "Yeah, I'm positive!"
